translation.en: ...inside the school. And then guess who found him?
Go over and tell her who you are and get her one coffee.
No, I don't have money for it.
- I'll pay for the coffee. Please? - He'll pay for it.
She's looking at you. She's blushing.
She's blushing. Dude, she wants you.
- Go over and talk - No, no, no.
- That's Ovi, though. - Isn't that hilarious?
Hasn't your father told you to come straight home after school?
Hey! What's up? He talk to her yet?
translation.ja: 調子は？ 彼女に話しかけたか？

translation.en: Did you talk to her yet?
Did he talk to... Come on, Ovi. You gotta go talk to her.
translation.ja: 何だよ　オヴィ 行ってこいって

translation.en: I know what you need. Come on.
Try it. Take one hit, man, it'll help you.
Are you guys from inside? Huh?
I think you dropped something, no?
- No, it's not ours. - Chill. Relax.
It's all good. You boys are lucky. You got your whole lives ahead of you.
translation.ja: 〈見逃してやるよ 前途ある若者だからな〉
やめて　やめてくれ

translation.en: I told you, you dumb motherfucker,
translation.ja: 〈息子から 目を離すなと―〉

translation.en: ...and yet Amir Asif has grabbed my son.
You think I can't hurt you from here?
translation.ja: 〈塀の中なら お前を殺せないと？〉

translation.en: You want your son to see his next birthday?
translation.ja: 〈自分の息子の 成長を見たいか？〉

translation.en: Tell Mahajan to pay the ransom and get his son back.
translation.ja: 〈身代金を 払えばいいのに―〉

translation.en: Why are they getting us involved in this?
There's not enough money. The NCB have frozen Mahajan's assets.
translation.ja: 〈ボスの資産は 麻薬管理局に凍結された〉

translation.en: I'm all he's got. You understand?
translation.ja: 俺が何とかするしかない

translation.en: There's a man who does this sort of thing.
His price will be out of Mahajan's reach.
But there's a way I can play this. It will not be easy.
translation.ja: 〈うまくいけば 利用できるかも〉

translation.en: You sure, bruh? 'Cause he looks fuckin' dead.
Quit swearin' all the time. - So? - It makes you sound stupid. Find another fuckin' adjective.
translation.ja: ガラの悪い話し方はよせ バカっぽく見える

translation.en: - Hold my beer, would you? - Oh, I gotcha.
- I said hold it. Don't drink it. - I gotcha.
There's a chicken in your bathroom.
translation.ja: バスルームに鶏がいる

translation.en: Yeah, I like chickens, except when they shit everywhere.
translation.ja: 鶏が好きだ フンには参るがな

translation.en: Extraction. Indian kid. Drug lord's son. A rival gangster is holding this kid in Dhaka.
translation.ja: インドの麻薬王の息子が ダッカに連れ去られたの

translation.en: I think Gaspar lives in Dhaka.
Gaspar is out of the game.
Clock's running at 16 hours. Deadline, Friday, noon. Proof of life as of six hours ago.
translation.ja: 救出期限は金曜正午 ６時間前には生きてた

translation.en: This gangster, Amir Asif, he holds a massive sway in Dhaka.
translation.ja: 首謀者アミール･アシフは ダッカの支配者よ

translation.en: You get your hands on this kid, it's gonna get complicated.
translation.ja: 関われば あなたも狙われる

translation.en: Nik, what are you doing here? Don't bullshit yourself.
translation.ja: バカ言うな こんなヤバい案件を 受ける奴は 他にいないだろ

translation.en: No one else is gonna commit to somethin' this fucked up.
translation.ja: こんなヤバい案件を 受ける奴は 他にいないだろ

translation.en: You're hoping if you spin the chamber enough times, you're gonna catch a bullet.
translation.ja: 何度も危険を冒せば いつか死ねると？

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, I'll meet you in Fitzroy Crossing.
translation.ja: 明日の朝― しらふでフィッツロイ･ クロッシングへ

translation.en: If you're not sober, don't show up.
translation.ja: しらふでフィッツロイ･ クロッシングへ
オヴィよ オヴィ･マハジャン

translation.en: This is our extract. Ovi Mahajan, 14 years old.
translation.ja: ダッカ市外 救出対象は― 救出対象は― オヴィ　14歳だ

translation.en: His father, Ovi Mahajan Senior, is in jail.
translation.ja: 父親 オヴィ･シニアは服役中

translation.en: So, his people employed us to get the boy back, and they refuse to negotiate.
translation.ja: 身代金で解決するのは 嫌だそうだ

translation.en: Amir Asif. Dhaka's very own Pablo Escobar.
translation.ja: アミール･アシフ ダッカの麻薬王

translation.en: Biggest drug lord in India versus biggest drug lord in Bangladesh.
translation.ja: 国を超えた麻薬王の対決ね

translation.en: A lot of bad blood between them.
This is our extraction point. So, José and Thiago will man a boat,
translation.ja: 少年を救出したら― この脱出拠点から 船で川を14キロ下り ヘリへ

translation.en: ferry you and the kid nine miles down the river to a chopper.
translation.ja: この脱出拠点から 船で川を14キロ下り ヘリへ

translation.en: - Any questions? - How many hostiles on site?
translation.ja: 質問は？ 現地の敵の数は？

translation.en: Maybe 20. Okay, clock is ticking. Let's chop- chop!
translation.ja: 20人かな 時間がない　急げ

translation.en: You see the laundry across the street?
You show me the kid's all right, I tell my people, they pay you. - Do you under-- -
translation.ja: 少年が生きてれば手配を…

translation.en: Listen, you boys seem like real busy professionals, so let's say we cut this shit and get down to business, yeah?
translation.ja: お前らも暇じゃないだろ 早く済ませようぜ
〈こいつ まばたきもしねえ〉

translation.en: Hey, man, you're crazy or what?
stick in his ass and blow his insides out.
translation.ja: ガキのケツに突っ込み ぶっ放す
嫌だ 嫌だよ　来ないで

translation.en: No! No, Amir, no! Amir, no!
translation.ja: 嫌だ　アミール やめて　助けて！

translation.en: Anybody feel like they remember now?
I know who took the money.
You just threw him off the roof.
You need to be smart. Use your wits.
translation.ja: 〈常に機転を 利かせることだ〉

translation.en: Cut off two of your fingers. Any two.
translation.ja: 〈指を２本 切り落とせ どれでもいい〉

translation.en: Because the kid who stole from me is dead.
translation.ja: 〈俺の金を盗んだガキは 死んだんだろ？〉

translation.en: And I'd like a walking reminder
of what happens when you touch my money.
translation.ja: 〈俺から盗むと こうなるぞと〉

translation.en: So you can still hold a gun.

translation.ja: 〈お前は賢いうえ 運がいい〉

translation.en: Close the city. Bridges, trains, airports... Close everything.
translation.ja: 〈市を封鎖しろ 橋や駅 空港など全てだ〉
〈無理でもやるんだ　大佐〉

translation.en: or you'll lose more than just a finger.
translation.ja: 〈でなきゃ 指１本じゃ済まんぞ〉

translation.en: Kid, you wanna survive, you do exactly as I say.
translation.ja: 命が惜しければ 従え

translation.en: Here. Eat this. Your blood sugar is low, that's why you feel like shit.
translation.ja: 食え　血糖値を上げる

translation.en: Twenty- one hundred meters out. In possession.
Copy. Alpha team is with the boat. In position.
translation.ja: 了解　チームが 船で待機してる

translation.en: Say your bloody name, come on.

translation.ja: 任務を続行する 来い

translation.en: Satellite's online. Rake and the kid are on route.
translation.ja: 衛星カメラを確認 移動を始めたわ

translation.en: You guys ready for us? We're 1,600 meters out.

translation.ja: よし　では後で マハジャン

translation.en: Sending proof of possession. You have seven minutes to transfer the funds.
translation.ja: 証拠の動画を見たら ７分で送金しろ

translation.en: There's an alarm going off in the engine room.
translation.ja: エンジン室で警報だ 見張りを頼む

translation.en: - G, I need you to be my eyes. - Copy that.
translation.ja: エンジン室で警報だ 見張りを頼む 了解

translation.en: Blockades have been set up on every bridge into and out of Dhaka.
I have teams combing the Buriganga as we speak.
translation.ja: 〈ブリガンガ川も 調べています〉

translation.en: I like this one. Get him a gun. Put his fingers to work.
translation.ja: 〈こいつを気に入った 銃を持たせてやれ〉

translation.en: Yeah, we gotta keep moving. Come on.
Rake's about five minutes from the boat.
Where are we at with the transfer?
- I don't know. - Well, try it again.
translation.ja: 分からない 確認を

translation.en: Call them back. Tell them they have 60 seconds to make the transfer.
translation.ja: 電話して “60秒で送金しないと―”

translation.en: Or they'll find Ovi's body floating in the Buriganga.
translation.ja: “少年の死体が 川に浮かぶ”と

translation.en: Tyler, something's wrong. Hold your position.
translation.ja: タイラー 何か変だわ　待機して

translation.en: G, you got eyes on the boat?
I'm looking at it right now. Our boys haven't come up yet.
translation.ja: ああ　だが仲間の姿がない

translation.en: I'm moving in for a closer look.
Colonel, stand by. We think we found something.
translation.ja: 〈大佐　何か見つけました〉

translation.en: - Nik, you're gonna wanna see this. - What is it?
translation.ja: ニック　見ろ 何？

translation.en: - Two hundred meters and closing in fast. - G?
There's someone else in those woods. About a hundred meters out and closing in on your position.
translation.ja: 森にも誰かいるわ 100メートル先から接近中

translation.en: Kid... Move fast. Stay low. Go!
translation.ja: おい　走るぞ 体を起こすなよ 今だ！

translation.en: We need air support by the river. They're in the forest.

translation.ja: タイラー　ヘリが来る

translation.en: Ovi, it's Saju! I'm here to take you home!
translation.ja: 〈オヴィ　サジュだ 家に帰ろう〉

translation.en: - Saju, I'm here! - Sit down and shut up!
translation.ja: サジュ！ 静かにしろ

translation.en: I need the boy! I won't hurt him!
translation.ja: オヴィを渡せ 助けに来たんだ

translation.en: When I tell you to, run like hell or I'm gonna kill you both. Understand?
translation.ja: 合図で走るか 奴と一緒に死ぬかだ

translation.en: Go on, kid. Go, go! Go! Come on.
- Here, get in the car. Get in the car. - Stop running!
Please let me go! Saju works for my father.
I work for your father. But something is fucked here.
translation.ja: 味方は俺だ　何かおかしい

translation.en: Saju could have a deal with the men who grabbed you and send you back to them.
translation.ja: あの男は敵の手先かも

translation.en: - Then take me to the police. - The cops are in on it.
translation.ja: 警察は？ グルに決まってる 俺を信じろ

translation.en: Look, if you wanna live, you have to trust me.
translation.ja: グルに決まってる 俺を信じろ

translation.en: I need eyes. Radio's compromised. Call my sat.
- How far past the gate? - What gate?
translation.ja: 門は？ 門って？　右折よ

translation.en: - Turn right. - Can't. Bloody truck is in the way.
translation.ja: 門って？　右折よ 無理だ　トラックが

translation.en: No, no, no! Left! You just passed it.
- Put your belt on. - What belt?
It's been on. You drive like you're insane!
translation.ja: してるよ　怖いもん

translation.en: We gotta move. Go. Up the stairs.
translation.ja: 移動だ　階段を上がれ

translation.en: Get up the stairs. Go. Come on. Move!
translation.ja: 屋上へ出るんだ　急げ！

translation.en: All right, kid. Do you trust me?
Stay on my shoulder, all right?
Get in, kid. Come on. Come on!
- You hit him with the truck. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 彼をはねた そうだ

translation.en: All right, kid. I need you to slide on over here.
Okay, we're gonna jump on three. All right?
The vehicle crashed. It flipped over and is in flames.
I want to see the bodies.
I want every gun in Dhaka pointed at this guy.
translation.ja: 〈ダッカ中の あらゆる銃で こいつを狙え〉

translation.en: All right. Close the door. Close it.
Can you give me a hand?
I need a hand. Hold that on there.
Just hook it through there and then pull it back this way.
translation.ja: そこを通して こっちへ

translation.en: Yep. - Yeah? - Yeah, I got it.
Our new friend is Saju Rav. Ex- Special Forces. He works for the kid's father.
translation.ja: サジュは元特殊部隊で 少年の父親の手下よ

translation.en: We were played. Second transfer never came through.
translation.ja: 彼らから ２回目の送金がなかった

translation.en: Mahajan got us to do the heavy lifting and he doesn't wanna pay.
translation.ja: 私たちは利用されたってわけ

translation.en: - City's on lockdown. You got cover? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 市は封鎖中よ　隠れてる？ ああ

translation.en: There's a clearing on east side of Sultana Kamal Bridge,
just outside the city. We can send a chopper and get you out.
translation.ja: スルタナ･カマル橋の 東にヘリを送る
距離は？ そこから４キロ

translation.en: You gotta leave the kid behind, Tyler.
Are you gonna leave me in the street?
The only chance of getting my money is you, mate. So...
translation.ja: 金は お前と交換なんだ

translation.en: Piano. I play the piano when I'm nervous.
translation.ja: ピアノだよ 不安な時 弾くと落ち着くんだ
不安な時 弾くと落ち着くんだ

translation.en: My father hates it when I do it.
He thinks of me the same way you do.
More like a thing than a person.
I didn't... I didn't mean it like that.
translation.ja: そういう意味じゃない

translation.en: If you don't hear from me in the next 12 hours...
translation.ja: 〈俺から 半日 連絡がなければ―〉

translation.en: When you wake up in the morning.

translation.ja: 〈はい パパ お手伝いする〉

translation.en: You got a chopper. Meet you at the east side of the bridge.
translation.ja: ヘリを手配した　橋の東へ
おい 起きろ　出発するぞ

translation.en: - Hey, this guy wants my gun! - My ankle is broken!
Leave my gun. Leave it! My friend is gonna shoot you!
translation.ja: 〈俺の銃だぞ お前なんか撃たれちまえ〉

translation.en: Hey! Give me my gun... Give it back!
That's my gun, give it back to me!
- Give it back or I'll blow you away! - I will finish you off.
- - Fuck! Come on. We gotta move.
translation.ja: クソ おい　移動だ
ギャスパーを なぜ？

translation.en: We just got attacked by the goonies from hell. We made it about four blocks.
translation.ja: ４ブロックほど進んだが 俺たちは…

translation.en: I said get rid of the kid.
I don't give a shit what you said.
We're in the worst smelling sewer on the planet. There's about 200 cops over our heads. Just call Gaspar.
translation.ja: 下水道は臭いし 200人もの警官に追われてる

translation.en: Tyler, I don't think that's a good idea.
The guy owes me his life, Nik.

translation.ja: タイラー… 奴を呼べ

translation.en: I appreciate you coming for us.
What the hell is wrong with you? Don't insult me.
We are south of the city center.
translation.ja: 位置は 市の中心の南側だ

translation.en: I told Nik that an extraction is... It's not feasible.
translation.ja: 救出は簡単じゃないと ニックに伝えた

translation.en: Well, you know, the city is surrounded by rivers.
There are bridges going in and out.
translation.ja: 市外につながる橋には 検問が敷かれてる

translation.en: But every one of those bridges currently is blocked by a roadblock
translation.ja: 市外につながる橋には 検問が敷かれてる 人気者のお前を 何としても捕まえるためにな

translation.en: because you are a very popular individual.
translation.ja: 人気者のお前を 何としても捕まえるためにな

translation.en: I figure we lie low a couple days, we let the panic dissipate.
translation.ja: ２日ほど潜伏しろ 騒ぎが静まったら動こう

translation.en: And we'll get you going. Now, my wife made that.
translation.ja: ２日ほど潜伏しろ 騒ぎが静まったら動こう さて― 嫁の手料理だ　必ず褒めろ

translation.en: So, I want you to be very careful what you say.
translation.ja: 嫁の手料理だ　必ず褒めろ

translation.en: And what's that for, the knee?
Hang on one sec... my knee. Ow! Oh, God. Oh, it hurts.
translation.ja: 俺のヒザも… 耐えられんほど痛い

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go. I gotta go. I gotta kiss my wife.
translation.ja: じゃあ少し外すよ 嫁にキスしてくる

translation.en: But you stay here and rest up. And I will be back.
translation.ja: ゆっくりしててくれ すぐ戻るから

translation.en: It's good to see you, man. I missed you.
I lost him... near the market.
translation.ja: 〈市場の近くで 見つけたのに〉

translation.en: Tell them to scour the market.
When you catch him, I want to be the one to pull the trigger.
translation.ja: 〈奴を捕まえたら 俺に引き金を引かせて〉

translation.en: If you let me do that, I'll give you the other finger!
translation.ja: 〈引かせてくれるなら もう１本 差し上げます〉

translation.en: He made me feel like a fool.

translation.ja: 〈助言をやろう 俺からの贈り物だ〉
〈これ以上 指を失くすな〉

translation.en: Because no matter how badass you think you are...
translation.ja: 〈お前がどれほど 強いつもりでも―〉

translation.en: there's always a badass who's bigger than you.
translation.ja: 〈到底かなわない奴は 今後も現れる〉

translation.en: If you had been killed today, it would have been my fault.
translation.ja: 僕のせいで あなたまで死にかけた

translation.en: No, mate. But it would've been my fault.
translation.ja: 死んだとしたら自業自得さ

translation.en: You don't look like a Tyler.
No? What do I look like?
translation.ja: じゃあ 何が似合う？

translation.en: That's not what I was going to ask. That's a strange last name, though.
translation.ja: 質問は別のこと でも変な名字だ

translation.en: Isn't that like a gardening tool?
What were you gonna ask me?
If you were always this way. You know... brave.
translation.ja: あなたは生まれつき その… 勇敢なの？

translation.en: Of course you are. You rescue people.
translation.ja: 勇敢だよ 人を救ってる

translation.en: Yeah, sometimes. Sometimes I do other things.
translation.ja: 時にはな 他のこともやる

translation.en: My father, he kills people, too.
Sometimes, I would sit with him at dinner, look at him and think,
translation.ja: 父さんを見ると思う “今日 父さんは―”

translation.en: he just killed somebody else's father that day.
I did have me a wife.
I don't know. I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.ja: さあな　ずいぶん会ってない

translation.en: He died a few years ago.
I wasn't even there... when he died.
translation.ja: 看取れなかった 息子を…

translation.en: Kandahar, Afghanistan. It was my third tour.
translation.ja: アフガニスタンに 出征中だった

translation.en: I told you, mate. I'm not brave. I'm just...
translation.ja: 言ったろ　勇敢じゃない

translation.en: You drown not by falling into the river,
translation.ja: “溺れるのは 川に落ちるからじゃない”

translation.en: but by staying submerged in it.
I read it in a book in school.
- Yes. Yes! - I don't know... It's the best dove hunting in Argentina.
translation.ja: アルゼンチンで一番の ハト狩り場だ

translation.en: Just lie in this pool... You lie in a pool and they fly around!
translation.ja: 横たわって待ち 飛び回るハトを…

translation.en: And you sip a Cuba Libre.
I shot my first dove when I was ten years old. Have I told you this?
translation.ja: 最初にハトを撃ったのは 10歳の時だ

translation.en: - I haven't. Listen. - I think you have.
No. It was when I was ten years old, my dad... My dad... The gun backfired,
translation.ja: 親父と一緒だったが― 銃のバックファイアで 目の周りにアザが

translation.en: gave me a black eye, and my dad laughs at me.
translation.ja: 銃のバックファイアで 目の周りにアザが

translation.en: I used to move so quick, kill those little shits.
translation.ja: 小さなハトを 撃つのは得意だった
だが昔の話だ　もう年だしな

translation.en: It sucks getting old, man. Sucks!
translation.ja: だが昔の話だ　もう年だしな クソったれ 年は取りたくない
クソったれ 年は取りたくない

translation.en: That kid is a walking corpse.
translation.ja: あのガキは歩く死体だ

translation.en: Asif will never let him live.
I mean, you get him home. And then, what? His father's in prison.
translation.ja: 家に帰してやっても― 父親は刑務所だし 守りきれるはずがない

translation.en: There's no way to protect him.
translation.ja: 父親は刑務所だし 守りきれるはずがない

translation.en: You know, the best thing you could do, honestly,
translation.ja: お前にできるのは 今すぐ部屋へ行き―

translation.en: would be to go up there right now and just go put a bullet in his brain.
translation.ja: お前にできるのは 今すぐ部屋へ行き― ひと思いに殺してやることだ
ひと思いに殺してやることだ

translation.en: 'Cause the animals out there, they're not gonna be... as kind to him.
translation.ja: 敵の手に渡れば そんな温情は望めない

translation.en: They like to start with the ears.
Then they cut off each finger at the joint.
translation.ja: 次に指を全て切られる

translation.en: You know how much he's worth?
We're talking about a kid, Gaspar.
We're talking about a gangster's kid.
With a price tag of ten million on his head.
You need to sober up, mate.
You're a mercenary, right, Tyler? Why don't you act the mercenary?
translation.ja: タイラー　傭兵なら 傭兵らしく振る舞え

translation.en: Aren't you sick of this life? 'Cause I am and I...
translation.ja: こんな暮らしは嫌だろ？

translation.en: I do not wanna end it playing hero on some goddamn suicide mission--
translation.ja: 俺は 英雄を気取って 死ぬのはゴメンだ

translation.en: What are you doing? You said you'd help me.
I am helping you. Ten million dollars.
translation.ja: だから言うんだ 1000万ドルだぞ

translation.en: I'll get you to the border in a couple hours.
translation.ja: お前は大金を手に帰れる

translation.en: It's money in your pocket. I take care of the body. Painless.
translation.ja: お前は大金を手に帰れる ガキだって 苦しまずに死ねれば万々歳だ

translation.en: And it's the best that that kid can hope for.
translation.ja: ガキだって 苦しまずに死ねれば万々歳だ

translation.en: - Did you call someone? Who'd you call? -
translation.ja: 誰かと話したな？　誰だ

translation.en: Why are you such a hypocrite? You've got the blood of a hundred men on your hands--
translation.ja: 偽善者め　お前もすねに傷を…

translation.en: Do you know happens to me if they find out that I'm helping you? Do you know what happens to my wife?
translation.ja: お前に手を貸したら 俺や嫁がどうなると思う？
アシフとは話がついてる

translation.en: I did some work for him. We made a deal.
translation.ja: アシフとは話がついてる ガキを殺せば 俺たちは 大金と自由を得られる

translation.en: He gets the kid, you get your freedom, and we both get rich.
translation.ja: ガキを殺せば 俺たちは 大金と自由を得られる

translation.en: What do you want from me? You want me to walk upstairs and shoot him in the head?
translation.ja: 俺に子供の頭を撃てと？
いや 違う 俺がやる

translation.en: What are we doing, man? Huh?
translation.ja: 何やってんだよ　なあ

translation.en: Come on, stay down. Stay down.
translation.ja: もうよせ　立ち上がるな

translation.en: I know it looks bad. I know it looks bad.
translation.ja: 誤解するな　話せば分かる

translation.en: I've got the boy. I need your help.
translation.ja: あの子といる　助けてくれ

translation.en: I want the boy out of here. That's all I care about.
He was gonna kill my family if I didn't get his son back.
translation.ja: 俺の家族の命も懸かってる

translation.en: My people are waiting for him on the other side of the Sultana Kamal bridge.
translation.ja: 橋の東で仲間が待ってる

translation.en: There's two blockades between here and there. I'll do my best to draw them away from both.
translation.ja: 検問は２ヵ所だ 敵は俺が引きつける

translation.en: You get him to the other side.
We'll have to go on foot.
But we've seen our friend... the kid must be near.
translation.ja: 〈傭兵は見つけたので その近くかと〉

translation.en: Hey! I'm telling you to stop!
- Take his hat off. Let me see his face. - Huh?
Take two more units to the bridge.
Two units to the bridge. Hurry!
Stay here. Stay down. I'm gonna draw them away from you.
translation.ja: 中にいろ　立つなよ 敵を遠ざける

translation.en: Rake, I need you on the bridge!
In hiding. About halfway across the bridge.
I'm trying to clear a path.
Fuck! I'm taking fire. Abort. I'm going around.
translation.ja: クソ！ 撃たれた 旋回する

translation.en: I need you to run as fast as you can for it.
translation.ja: ヘリまで 全速力で走れ

translation.en: Bogeys are down. LZ clear. Two- minute window.
translation.ja: 着陸ゾーン確保 ２分で乗り込め
